name: Bum Bag Bangin'
description:
Oi! Oi!

Headin' to work, geezers be starin' green with envy over yours truly. Got me a new codpeice, a bum-bag banger. Turning heads like no other, the pack on ma fanny drawin' eyes like a well fit bird.

And now I'm in trouble, head's swellin', seein' double. Let me through, let me through, I can take a compliment or two, but this is ridiculous. I got less than minutes, and every second me ballsack-rucksack's drawin' mad crew.

It's bad news for the ego of a wizard like me bro. Let's go Let's go Let's go!

HOW TO PLAY
- Run as far as you can, avoiding complements, too many will go to your head!
- Up/Down - move
- Space - shoot

CREDITS
- Jacob Janerka (@ParadigmGame) - Art
- Jon Murphy (@nuclearfriend) - Code
- Dave Lloyd (@duzzondrums) - Code
- Adrian Vaughan (@yeoldshrimpeyes) - Voices
- Ben Weatherall (@sunraheadgear) - Music
- Louis Meyer (@louisdmeyer) - All the things that didn't make it in
